Mass-produced cannon fodder, you can use it at will or keep it around to do chores. Can cause full damage to the city wall[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]
Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. Can cause full damage to city walls

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. Can cause full damage to the city wall, and has [ICON_Bombard] long-range bombing power with [ICON_Range] range of 1
A tactical man who is well equipped and experienced in combat. Can cause full damage to the city wall, and has [ICON_Bombard] long-range bombing power with [ICON_Range] range of 1

Mass-produced cannon fodder, you can use it at will or keep it around to do chores. Has [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] ranged combat power of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] has weak ranged combat power[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit does not gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

If high-end cannon fodder is more resistant to beating than mass-produced cannon fodder, if it can be selected to be made into office decorations, it will definitely be the glory of these cannon fodder's life. Has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with [ICON_Range] range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak

The mass-produced cannon fodder that has survived on the front line will perform amazingly well when squatting in the trenches. Has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with [ICON_Range] range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak

Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. Has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with [ICON_Range] range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak

Tactical Dolls who have made outstanding contributions on the battlefield will be remembered by all Tactical Dolls. Has [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] remote combat power with a range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Researching {LOC_TECH_MILITARY_SCIENCE_NAME} can improve the unit's combat power[ENDCOLOR]

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. Has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with [ICON_Range] range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak
A well-equipped and combat-experienced Tactical Doll. Has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with [ICON_Range] range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak
Create a new heavily armored tactical figure

Tactical dolls that have failed any tests can be sent to the front lines to serve as cannon fodder to test their actual combat performance. Has thicker armor than regular T-Dolls and has [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] ranged combat power of 1, but [ICON_Movement] moves slowly[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit does not gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

The mass-produced cannon fodder that has survived on the front line will perform amazingly well when squatting in the trenches. It has thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls, and has [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement

Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. It has thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls, and has [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. It has thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls, and has [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement

A well-equipped and combat-experienced Tactical Doll. It has thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls, and has [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement

Mass-produced cannon fodder, you can use it at will or keep it around to do chores. Has extra vision, and the vision can pass through any terrain. The unit [ICON_Movement] moves without terrain penalty[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. Has extra vision, and the vision can pass through any terrain, and the unit [ICON_Movement] moves without terrain penalty

If high-end cannon fodder is more resistant to beating than mass-produced cannon fodder, if it can be selected to be made into office decorations, it will definitely be the glory of these cannon fodder's life. Has [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] remote attack with range 3, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] but extremely low melee combat effectiveness

Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. Has [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] range attack with range 3, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] but extremely low melee combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Tactical dolls that have failed any tests can be sent to the front lines to serve as cannon fodder to test their actual combat performance. Has [ICON_Range][ICON_Bombard] bombardment attack with range 2, +17[ICON_Strength] combat strength against cavalry[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

Tactical figures that have been improved solely through simulation training or through the use of combat records. Has [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with [ICON_Range] range of 3, +17 [ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry

Tactical Dolls who have made outstanding contributions on the battlefield will be remembered by all Tactical Dolls. Has [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with [ICON_Range] range of 3, +17 [ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. Has [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with [ICON_Range] range of 4, +17 [ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry

A well-equipped and combat-experienced Tactical Doll. Has [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with [ICON_Range] range of 5, +17[ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry, +67[ICON_Strength] combat power against doomsday mechas
It has a lively and cute character, with a very clingy and loyal dog attribute. It will definitely complete the orders it accepts, and likes the commander to pat its head as a reward.

A timid and easily shy humanoid girl, she is a delusional person who is addicted to her own delusions. She often talks to herself about her thoughts endlessly, and will be at a loss once she finds out that she is overheard by others. But if she is forced into a "desperate situation"... please be mentally prepared for the situation to be uncontrollable.

Unable to build all land units and pioneers in the original version, but able to build Tactical Dolls and Crawlers[NEWLINE]All military units have +50% combat experience, but[COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Some Tactical Dolls cannot gain experience[ENDCOLOR]
Specialized pioneers with certain defensive abilities cannot use melee attacks. This unit [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] is very expensive [ENDCOLOR], but the price will never increase

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB_NAME}, initially unlocked, cost is free and will never increase in price, +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade capacity after completion, and a merchant unit is given as a gift, with a unique [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus. After researching {LOC_TECH_IRON_WORKING_NAME}, the [ICON_Gold] gold adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Production] productivity. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT_NAME}, initially unlocked, can be built around the city center, has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus, and when built will release the crawlers consumed when creating the city. The area only has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 3[ICON_Ranged] remote attacks

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE_NAME} and requires {LOC_TECH_APPRENTICESHIP_NAME}, which is cheaper and has the unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

The city will not be war-weary, units do not need to be garrisoned to regenerate health at the beginning of the round, improved cells +3 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +1 [ICON_Faith] faith, plus +2 [ICON_Production] production after researching {LOC_TECH_ELECTRICITY_NAME}.

He is a lively, flamboyant and arrogant humanoid who likes to point fingers at others. He will remain quiet during battle and use exaggerated gestures instead, so he can be regarded as a serious and responsible fighter.

Cities will not be war-weary, units do not need to be garrisoned to regenerate health at the start of a round, all cities you create or capture will have a trading post from the beginning, and after creating a trade route, a trading post will immediately appear in the destination city. In-territorial espionage -4 levels, +1 diplomatic visibility each for researching {LOC_TECH_STIRRUPS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_BALLISTICS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME} and {LOC_TECH_COMPOSITES_NAME}
of the Forward Readiness Force Intelligence Center
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 1
Use the Tactical Humanoid Leader of the Griffin Intelligence Center Division to obtain Intelligence Advantage Level 1 by meeting the required conditions.
A reporter from your intelligence center reported a news story
Griffin Forward Readiness Force Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 2
Use the Tactical Humanoid Leader of the Griffin Intelligence Center Division and achieve the required conditions to obtain Intelligence Advantage Level 2
An informant from your intelligence center has heard
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center intelligence advantage level 3
Use the Tactical Humanoid Leader of the Griffin Intelligence Center Division and achieve the required conditions to obtain Intelligence Advantage Level 3
Diplomats from your intelligence center report to
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 4
Use the Tactical Humanoid Leader of the Griffin Intelligence Center Division and achieve the required conditions to obtain Intelligence Advantage Level 4
A secret telegram from your intelligence center

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_CAMPUS_NAME}, initially unlocked, cost free and never increasing in price, with unique [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus. [ICON_Food] Food adjacent bonuses also provide [ICON_Science] research and [ICON_Gold] gold coins. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE_NAME}, requires {LOC_TECH_APPRENTICESHIP_NAME}, is cheaper to build, provides +1 [ICON_Power] to all cities upon completion, and has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus. The [ICON_Production] productivity bonus also provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Her words and deeds are elegant and steady, full of aristocratic temperament, and she has a strong sense of honor. Her commanding tone can be a bit condescending, but her rich and skilled experience and strength are deeply admired and relied upon by everyone.

A frivolous, arrogant, self-respecting humanoid who likes to point fingers at things around him. In fact, he is a good old man who loves to worry. Every statement about combat seems arrogant, but with her unfathomable strength and experience, it will eventually turn into something possible.

Since the files on the original project have been erased, HS.50 knows very little about her past, so she hopes to integrate into Griffin as soon as possible. But it seems that due to the influence of the past, she only knows how to use simple tactical skills to deal with daily life, which makes it difficult for her to get along with her companions. Currently, HS.50 is working towards becoming more user friendly

He claimed to have served as a highway patrol officer on Highway 666, but his former department was an unregistered and unknown organization, and his police certificate could not verify its legality. Despite his bad manners and ridiculing habits, Griffin was eventually transferred to management because of his extraordinary strength. If you want to reduce her usual troubles with you, it's best to prepare some soda to divert her interest in you.

Mass-produced cannon fodder, you can use it at will or keep it around to do chores. -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plunder only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to adjacent conventional T-Dolls, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move from this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]. Unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

If high-end cannon fodder is more resistant to beating than mass-produced cannon fodder, if it can be selected to be made into office decorations, it will definitely be the glory of these cannon fodder's life. -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plunder only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to adjacent conventional T-Dolls, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts moving next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.

If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plunder only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to adjacent conventional T-Dolls, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.

A well-equipped and combat-experienced Tactical Doll. -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plunder only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to adjacent conventional T-Dolls, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
+15[ICON_Range] long-range combat power for regular tactical T-Dolls within 1 square
+3 vision range and passes through all terrains, able to detect invisible units within the field of view
+2[ICON_Movement] movement power, all formation units gain [ICON_Movement] movement power of accompanying units

A cute, smart, and somewhat narcissistic humanoid. The source of his confidence is not his strength, but his unique vision. She is good at acting coquettishly and telling jokes on weekdays, but in battle she can remain calm and will not be discouraged even if she encounters a defeat.
+{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] ranged combat strength from adjacent support Tactical T-Dolls

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_SPACEPORT_NAME}, initially unlocked, cost is free and will never increase in price, can be built regardless of population demand (not a specialized area), has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus, has five [ICON_Citizen] expert slots, +100% [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus after researching {LOC_CIVIC_GUILDS_NAME}. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

The city will not be war-weary, and units do not need to be stationed to recover health at the beginning of the round. All cells in the city will receive +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. After researching {LOC_TECH_ECONOMICS_NAME}, +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins will be added.
Using Griffin Tactical Humanoid Leader FN-57
A coded message from your spy
Griffin's frontline combat readiness team warehouse special project, initially unlocked, after the project is completed, the city +2 [ICON_Citizen] citizens

An eccentric, hedonistic humanoid girl who bites her tongue every time she says her name. She only cares about interesting things. For this reason, she can challenge many things that break the bottom line of principles. She is currently working hard to make MT9 interesting.
of the frontline combat readiness depot

Cities will not be war-weary, units do not need to be garrisoned to regenerate health at the start of the round, cities cannot obtain [ICON_Citizen] citizens, they can only obtain [ICON_Citizen] by completing projects. The initial [ICON_Food] food output of all cell terrains and landforms in the city provides the same amount of [ICON_Production] productivity output, allowing mines and quarries to be built on flat land.

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT_COMPLEX_NAME}, initially unlocked, cost is free and will never increase in price, has a unique [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus, [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Production] productivity, after researching {LOC_CIVIC_MERCANTILISM_NAME}, + 100% [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

C-MS characteristic building, after completion, the assault tactical humanoid will have +7 [ICON_Strength] combat power and the confrontation area will have +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power. All units have +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. They will not suffer combat strength debuffs after being injured. [NEWLINE] If it is not owned by the city creator, the city will have -40 loyalty per round.

C-MS's characteristic building, after completion, the Assault Tactical Doll has an additional attack of 1 per round and can move after attacking. +2 [ICON_Movement] movement speed for all units, ignores [ICON_Movement] movement penalties for terrain and crossing rivers[NEWLINE] -70% for cities not owned by the city's creator[ICON_Food][ICON_Production][ICON_Gold][ICON_Faith][ICON_Science ][icon_Culture]All output

C-MS characteristic building, after completion, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when assault tactics humanoid defense and +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending friendly units within a surrounding cell, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending all units, upgrade Will not end its turn (this ability continues to be effective for already produced units. If a building is lost, newly produced units will no longer have this ability until the building is acquired again) [NEWLINE] If it is not owned by the city creator, the city -20[ ICON_Amenities]Amenity

Probably when you are with her, you will wonder who is the real boss. She always treats people around her as subordinates and uses her unruly style to satisfy her various willful wishes. But donâ€™t worry, she will never treat her good subordinates badly. Maybe run an errand for her and buy some snacks, and she will bring you any victory you want.
_CITY_NAME_9',,'Griffin Space Uplink Command Center' FROM CivilizationsGirlfrontline WHERE CivilizationType LIKE
